Epiphany is the GNOME web browser.

== Key Features ==

* Categorised bookmarks

* Tabbed Browsing

* Crash restore

* Customisable settings via 'about:config' page

== Screenshot ==

<nowiki>[[File:scrn.epiphany.jpg]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==

* Via '''<nowiki>[[Synaptic|Synaptic Package Manager]]</nowiki>'''
* Via apt-get
<pre>
sudo apt-get install epiphany-browser
</pre>
